valid_articles.Title: Video: Google Volatility, Indexing Bugs, Google Ads Broad Match Default & YouTube SEO Tips
valid_articles.Description:
For the original iTunes version, click here.

This week, guess what, we had more volatility over the weekend and also a blip in the middle of the week.  Google also had another indexing bug that lasted only about an hour.  Google Search Console had a bug with new owner notifications. Google Search Console now lets you enter your shipping and return policies in settings. Google said it found the feedback it collected on the last core update really helpful.  Google updated its URL best practices document to say don’t use fragments to change content on the page.  Google Search will now extract composite images with trained algorithmic media types...
